page.title: 05Open Cast Mining.
page.content: The open cast pit just outside{ {Loanhead}is privately owned by Anglo Scottish Minerals of{Denny} Stirlingshire. The pit is on the{West Edge}Farm land, which is owned by Mr Robertson, and has been worked on for nearly 2 years. Four men and four vehicles work on the seven acres of land. The coal is transported in huge lorries to Alloa where it is used in the power stations. The project still has another 2 years left, but on completion a new by pass will sit on the land that was once mined by monks who lived there centuries ago. Jennifer Mcguire.
